name: Guggenheim International TRASH ART SHOW - installation design
description: This is an installation design for the New York Guggenheim Museum's International Trash Art Show. Make it happen! Let the low art be high art. Let's turn things around and enjoy the view. // Peter Weiler is a Hungarian artist working with digital tools. He tells stories of our disturbed and lonely life under cyber-capitalism. This work was minted on June 2nd, 2021 and signed on the back :)
